original_title: Satchmo: The Life of Louis Armstrong
overview: Satchmo. Theer are few people in this country - or around the world - who will not recognize that name. Louis Armstrong embodied twentieth-century American culture. He revolutionized the world of music and became one of the nation's most influential entertainers. No other performer of his era has such a profound effect as a singer as well as an instrumentalist.
title: Satchmo: The Life of Louis Armstrong
